name: Data Structures & Algorithms Mastery
description: Comprehensive learning system for mastering Data Structures and Algorithms with 7 specialized agents, interactive lessons, and hands-on coding challenges

agents.name: Foundations & Complexity Analysis
agents.description: Master fundamental concepts and asymptotic analysis

agents.name: Linear Data Structures
agents.description: Learn arrays, strings, linked lists, stacks, and queues

agents.name: Non-Linear Data Structures
agents.description: Explore trees, heaps, and graph fundamentals

agents.name: Searching & Sorting Algorithms
agents.description: Master search and sort algorithm techniques

agents.name: Advanced Topics & System Design
agents.description: Learn hashing, bit manipulation, and real-world applications

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start your learning journey and choose a path

commands.name: explore-agent
commands.description: Explore and understand all available agents

commands.name: practice
commands.description: Get practice problems and coding challenges

commands.name: interview-prep
commands.description: Prepare for technical interviews with targeted learning
